channel.title: [Bring it Back] Re-Creating Runescape 2 [Text/Browser-Based] - HiddenEclipse
channel.description:
I had a project a long time ago that I got lousy on and gave up on, due to more important things I had to do. But here I am, today, glad to say that I'm bring it back! You can find the original development thread here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,558671.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,558671.0.html[/url] I know a lot of people really liked this project, and I liked developing it, that's why I'm bringing it back. All live progress and updates can be seen at [url=http://www.hiddeneclipse.com]http://www.hiddeneclipse.com[/url]. I need a graphics developer!! Application format:
Name: Do you have Skype?: If yes, Skype username?: What skills do you have with graphics?: Can you show me some of your work?: (Links, pictures, etc.) What programs do you use?: (Photoshop, GIMP, paint, etc.) How old are you?: Do you consider yourself fit for this position?: (why?) Are you ready to make some graphics?:
I'll be getting quite a bit of work in today! Being worked on: [code] - Restarting the CSS layout, old one was horrible. May use canvas, not sure. - Working on gameframe [/code] Update Log: [code] - Over 3,000 general sprites downloaded (Thanks Infexis of google) - Created Login Screen - Started building gameframe - Started doing inventory tabs [/code] Credits and Thanks! [b]Infexis[/b] (3,000 General Sprites Pack) [size=14pt][i][b]Any questions or to support me on the project and provide ideas, contact me on Skype: aj.cordio[/b][/i][/size] [size=12pt][b]Images[/b][/size] [img]http://puu.sh/44eDf.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44eDH.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44eEj.jpg[/img]

So, is this still a thing? I personally think it would be awesome to see it finished

item.title: [Bring it Back] Re-Creating Runescape 2 [Text/Browser-Based] - HiddenEclipse
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

dwarfs222:

GL

Thank you.

runeite51:

Interesting. What have you got in mind for actual game play?

It’s not going to be a thing where you use WASD or the arrow keys to walk around. You’ll use energy and stamina to travel to different locations (such as the 100 run, ‘power’ you have in real Runescape). In each place you’ll have a variety of things you can do there. For example, in Seers village, you can do woodcutting. Other stats that don’t require an object, but only items from your inventory, you can do anywhere. Such as fletching, firemaking, etc. As long as supplies are ample.

Read full topic

item.title: [Bring it Back] Re-Creating Runescape 2 [Text/Browser-Based] - HiddenEclipse
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I had a project a long time ago that I got lousy on and gave up on, due to more important things I had to do. But here I am, today, glad to say that I’m bring it back! You can find the original development thread here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,558671.0.html

I know a lot of people really liked this project, and I liked developing it, that’s why I’m bringing it back. All live progress and updates can be seen at http://www.hiddeneclipse.com.

I need a graphics developer!!

Application format:

Name: Do you have Skype?: If yes, Skype username?: What skills do you have with graphics?: Can you show me some of your work?: (Links, pictures, etc.) What programs do you use?: (Photoshop, GIMP, paint, etc.) How old are you?: Do you consider yourself fit for this position?: (why?) Are you ready to make some graphics?:

I’ll be getting quite a bit of work in today!

Being worked on:

- Restarting the CSS layout, old one was horrible. May use canvas, not sure.
- Working on gameframe

Update Log:

- Over 3,000 general sprites downloaded (Thanks Infexis of google)
- Created Login Screen
- Started building gameframe
- Started doing inventory tabs

Credits and Thanks!
Infexis (3,000 General Sprites Pack)

[size=14pt]Any questions or to support me on the project and provide ideas, contact me on Skype: aj.cordio[/size]

[size=12pt]Images[/size]
